title: Miley Cyrus smiles again as she grabs coffee with new lover Cody Simpson
text:

Here is something we haven't seen in a while, Miley Cyrus looking very smiley.

The singer and boyfriend Cody Simpson were beaming as they grabbed a coffee on Sunday afternoon.

The 26-year-old called him her 'boo thang' on social media - and things seem to be moving fast .

After enjoying the day together, they refuelled at Studio City in the San Fernando Valley.

There wasn't a cloud in the sky but Miley's hair looked very wet - so maybe the hot drink was needed to warm her up.

Not that things aren't cosy between them.

(Image: P&P / MEGA)

(Image: P&P / MEGA)

Since she parted from girlfriend Kaitlynn Carter after their short-lived romance fizzled out, the Australian musician appears to have won her heart.

That split came of course after Miley's marriage to Liam Hemsworth crumbled just six months in this summer.

Cody could be just what she needs right now.

A newly resurfaced video from 2012 has proved that the teen sensation has always had feelings for the Hannah Montana star.

(Image: P&P / MEGA)

(Image: Cody Simpson Instagram)

Cody was at a star-studded launch of Tiffany & Co. Mens line in Los Angeles on Friday, when he told People : "The reason why it hasn't been a really crazy sudden thing is just because we’ve been friends for so long."

Such is his fondness of Miley he is planning to release a song he penned for her while she was in hospitalised with tonsillitis.

He has already teased his fans by sharing an excerpt of the new track on Instagram .

(Image: Getty Images)

"She’s pretty much forcing me to put it out," he said.

"She was like, ‘If you don’t put this s*** out, I’m putting it out on your behalf for you.

"I’m getting your Spotify login and doing this s*** myself.”
description: The pair look very happy as they step out in Studio City in California - but why is her hair soaked through?
